short_description: backwoods brewing company is a brewery based in portland, oregon, united states.
long_description: we embrace the idea of work and play as a team. backwoods brewing was founded by the waters family in july of 2012. our beer can be found throughout the nw, including washington, oregon and idaho.
business_tags: craft beers | home brew | brewery | large parties | national forest | event spaces | features & photos | website accessibility assistance
generated_description: backwoods brewing company is a family-owned craft beer company located in carson, washington, with a second location in portland, oregon. founded in 2012 by the waters family, the company prides itself on brewing craft beers from the best ingredients found in the northwest, including washington, oregon, and idaho. the team of brewers and staff consists of all local family and friends, and the company's success is founded on the camaraderie of the backwoods family. the first brews that came out of the pub were made on a small one-barrel system, but due to increasing demand and growing awareness of the brew pub, the family has upgraded to a 7-barrerel and finally the 20-barrell system that they brew on today. backwoods brewing's beer can be found throughout the northwest.
generated_business_tags: food and beverage | craft beers | loaded tots and wraps
